Items.Name: SUPERB MIKIMOTO PEARL TRIPLE STRAND NECKLACE!
Items.Description: This is as rare as Mikimoto gets! A TRIPLE STRAND MIKIMOTO necklace. This absolutely stunning necklace almost never appears on eBay. It is authenticated as Mikimoto by a Certified Graduate Gemologist (GIA)-AGA. You have three strands of nearly flawless pearls with a total of 277 pearls graduating from 3.7mm to 7.3mm. Color is a very light cream with a very light ros_ overtone with a thick nacre--classic, high-end Mikimoto. Not least, the luster is simply superb. This is where it counts! The GIA appraisal accords it a very high AA status. (Another appraiser certified this triple strand necklace as AA+!) The strands are extremely well-matched, a Mikimoto specialty. When you're matching 277 pearls you must have thousands of pearls from which to choose to make one superbly matched necklace. This is why Mikimoto is renowned and it shows here. The strands are 15 and 1/2 to 17 and 1/2 inches long, with a sterling silver Mikimoto clasp adorned with a 4.2mm pearl. Both appraisals are available for your inspection. This is a no-risk Mikimoto triple strand! The photos don't even begin to capture the stellar luster and exquisite matching of this rare Mikimoto triple strand. Condition is absolutely MINT! Walk into ANY Mikimoto dealer and you'll see that a triple strand of this quality sells for $5,000. Yet the reserve on this triple strand is very near the WHOLESALE price! This is THE holiday gift of the year. Shipping and insurance are to be paid by the buyer. Payment is by cashier's check, Western Union or PAYPAL. BUY WITH CONFIDENCE! Clothing I sell can be described as "better quality" clothing of a designer name brand purchased in Nordstroms, Macys, Saks, Niemans, Grodins, Talbots, Casual Corner, Ann Taylor, etc. All items are used, and most items look new. See my other auctions. I don't put anything on auction that I would not wear myself or ask my man-friend to wear. I have a long time corporate background and know what career clothing comprises the "dress for success" look. I am human and do my very best to represent items honestly, point out any flaws I find, and leave you feeling great about what you buy. I work very hard to offer consistent positive customer service. If I miss an obvious flaw in my description, I will deal with you with integrity. Colors are sometimes distorted, as it's hard to get all the software to work together with total accuracy. I try to describe colors. YOU MAY NEED TO DRY CLEAN OR LAUNDER THE ITEM, according to its label instructions, although some items will not need it. Because my profit margin is low and because the items usually get pretty wrinkled in transit, I do not invest in dry cleaning most items prior to sale. Just compare what you would pay for the item in a department store, and the dry cleaning cost will seem minimal. :) You will most likely need to press a garment after its journey through the mail. We do leave feedback for our buyers on all transactions. Buyers outside the USA are responsible for all customs charges which may be incurred as a result of your merchandise purchase. Illinois buyers will need to add 7.25% sales tax. Payment Information We will be happy to accept your personal check and ship at once on any purchase up to $30 up to $75 if your feedback rating is at least 25 Checks should be imprinted with your address information. For purchases outside these parameters we accept money orders, bank checks and credit card payments via PayPal BidPay Billpoint PayPal payments should be sent to Mike@greattie.com Payment is to be made in US Dollars only on all items. HOLIDAY SHIPPING OPTIONS FOR THE USA We ship almost everything using the US Post Office. If the shipping charge stated is less than $3.50, the item is shipped via first class mail which is normally 2 to 4 days to anywhere in the USA. There is no delivery confirmation available on this and packages in rare instances have taken up to two weeks to arrive (way less than 1% of the time). Past history in shipping tells us that the Post Office actually does a very good job in December, yet with the volume of mail they process, packages do sometimes get misrouted. All items with a stated shipping charge of $3.50 or more are already shipped via priority mail, most with a delivery confirmation. Priority mail shipping with a delivery confirmation number sent to you is available on any item we sell where the shipping charge is stated at under $3.50. The cost for this is $4 and applies to the ties and most of the small ornaments that we are selling. If you want this service just submit $4 in place of any lower shipping amount stated and we will ship priority mail. Express mail overnight shipping is also available at a cost of $13.00 up to 8 ounces (single ties), 8 ounces to 2 pounds at $17 (most plates) and 2 to 3 pounds, $20. This is guaranteed overnight to most of the USA but may take two days to more rural areas. If you want to use this service have your payment in by noon CST or call me at 847-924-8744 and I will let you know if I will be able to get the item out that day. Any questions, feel free to call me at the number above. Please click here to see all of our auctions. We will not be shipping from 12/28/01 to 1/6/02, resuming on 1/7/02. This will, of course, have NO effect on shipments being sent prior to Christmas. If you have any questions during this time please e-mail them to mike@greattie.com and we will respond to them when we return.
